summary:
Focused on circular neighbourhoods and systems - empowering people to take responsibility in sustainable transitions. Also, diving into the field of regenerative agriculture and food systems, learning while doing.
#circulareconomy #citymaking #climate #inclusion #regenerativeagriculture #andthepeople

I am a social innovation and Human Centered Design expert and an enthusiastic entrepreneur. I use system & service design thinking to create positive impact, and have broad experience in developing and executing propositions and interventions in developing countries, as well as western context for societal and environmental challenges.

Great at motivating, coaching and guiding teams in understanding target users and their context and finding and validating propositions and solutions driven by consumer insights. 

Get in touch at:  joris(at)andthepeople.org

treasury_media.title: And The People
treasury_media.description: Human Centered Design & implementatie bureau, wij ontwerpen innovaties en realiseren systeem oplossingen vanuit de belevingswereld van de eindgebruiker. And The People is een Certified B Corporation en gevestigd op het Marineterrein in  Amsterdam.

education.field_of_study: Master Specialization Technology in Sustainable Development

projects.title: Community Land Trust Bijlmer - Inclusieve Gebiedontwikkeling
projects.description:
Samen met stadsdeel Zuid Oost, mensen uit de H-buurt en collega's van Publieke Versnellers ontwikkelen we het Stadslab Community Land Trust Bijlmer. We testen in een Social Lab of de inzet van CLT segregatie in steden tegen kan gaan; kunnen de principes van een Community Land Trust (CLT) een handvat bieden aan de wijk om zelf aan het roer te staan ten behoeve van inclusieve gebiedsontwikkeling?

Meer info: 
https://www.cltbijlmer.nl/

projects.title: Regionale samenwerking voor uitvoering van het SER Energieakkoord
projects.description:
In de regio IJmond Zuid-Kennemerland werkt dit team samen aan energiebesparing en energieopwekking bij particuliere woningeigenaren. De deelnemers vormen een lerend netwerk.

Zo zullen de aankomende periode oa de volgende diensten en producten in de regio worden ingezet:
De Opgewekte Woning Club
Duurzaam Bouwloket
De Haarlemse Huizenaanpak
De Energiepioniers

De onderliggende methode is 'Kansrijke Aanpakken'

contributors.headline: Coördinator Team Duurzaamheid bij Gemeente Haarlem

projects.title: Spindle Summer Labs - Start Up Accelerator
projects.description:
In five Fridays, participants of selected teams, with ideas on how to improve international development, were trained in Design Thinking as a process for problem-solving and guided in developing their idea into a prototype and actionable plan. 
Next to developing the content and the program we facilitated in creative support and coaching. 

Spindle Summerlabs is an initiative of Partos – the Dutch membership body for organisations working in international development. Training and coaching in collaboration with STBY.

More info: 
https://thespindle.org/summerlabs/
http://thespindle.org/best-idea-award-2017/

projects.title: InBusiness - growing inclusive businesses from the informal sector - Kenya
projects.description:
With InBusiness we are setting up a program to support young entrepreneurs in the informal sector in (peri) urban settings in Kenya to transform and grow their subsistence businesses into profitable and inclusive business ventures, creating jobs for youth, women and people with disabilities. We are currently prototyping our first service solutions in Nakuru. 

Role: research and design lead 
Partners: Light For The World, Proportion, BoPinc,UDPK, KENASVIT and MSEA .

More info:
https://www.lightfortheworld.nl/projecten/inbusiness/

projects.title: Cirkelmarkt - Opportunities of the circular economy for the markets - Amsterdam
projects.description:
Within this Waste Lab, we are investigating, by action research, innovative ways to engage companies and citizens to take ownership in the circular system of waste recycling in the neighbourhood of the "Ten Kate" market in Amsterdam.

Waste Lab aims at developing new propositions and experiments to increase local collection and reuse, recycling, or upcycling of waste / raw materials which are within the system of the Ten Kate market. 

More info:
www.cirkelmarkt.nl

projects.title: Start-up entrepreneurs in Agri-business - Vijana Reloaded
projects.description:
Together with Proportion Foundation, ICS and local partners JOOUST and Nailab we are setting up the social enterprise Vijana Reloaded. Vijana (swahili  for youth) Reloaded coaches youth (18-30) in creating successful businesses or creating fresh entrepreneurial solutions to challenges of existing companies. The 6-months training is very practical and guides youth in developing entrepreneurship, ICT & social skills, in relation with the agricultural sector.

We developed a curriculum based on lean start-up methodology and human centered design principles, and tested and improved it in our first centre in Kakamega. Currently we are exploring our scale up strategy, and seeking partners for scaling throughout rural Kenya and creating new business models.

More info:
www.vijanareloaded.com

projects.title: Opgewekte Woning Club (=The bright home club); enables home owners to create a guide for making their house more energy efficient
projects.description:
For cities with grand policy objectives one of the most difficult things is getting your inhabitants in joining you in these ambitions. And The People, together with the municipality of Haarlem designed an approach aimed to involve inhabitants in the energy transition and to create a scaleable strategy to become a climate neutral city in 2030. 

One of the outcomes is a product-service which enables home owners to create plans for making their homes more energy efficient, together with their neighbours. ‘De Opgewekte Woning Club’ enables and empowers homeowners to make a practical guide for their house to reduce their energy consumption thus carbon footprint based on maintenance, quality of living and sustainability ambitions.
 
Tasks include the overall project management for setting up a social business of the proposition, and to provide technical expertise and social design efforts for a train the trainer proposition.

contributors.headline: Deelgenoot bij de Oesterzwammerij - Chef Oesterzwammenvertroetelaar (je kunt er nooit genoeg aandacht aan schenken).

projects.title: Policy research and design Lab @The Ministry of the Interior (Min BZK)
projects.description:
The Dutch government is seeking for ways to co-develop policies which place the end-user in the middle and embraces multi-stakeholder approach. Analysis, field research, ideation and prototyping are phases in the project that are new to policy makers, however in the DNA of strategic designers. Two policy subjects are part of the r&d lab including housing cooperatives and private housing investors. 
Tasks include methodology development of the policy research and design lab by streamlining the process and design of tools and templates. Next to this to provide strategic and design input to translate insights to tested prototypes that feed possible solutions in the policy labs.

projects.title: Development of a scalable bottom-up strategy towards a more sustainable neighborhood - Municipality of Haarlem
projects.description: This 3-year project has the objective to develop scalable bottom-up strategy towards a more sustainable neighborhood and housing market. The main target group are home-owners and results are expected in the themes of energy reduction and generation, waste- and water-management. The development of the program and its objectives is through direct implementation in a Community of Practice to pilot proposed interventions. The project falls under the umbrella of the broader strategy of the Gov of Netherlands called "block to block approach", but is a direct initiative of the municipality of Haarlem to involve all target groups of their inhabitants in its mission to become climate/carbon neutral in 2030.

projects.title: Value Chain Strengthening - JP/HRO & Clinton Foundation @ Haiti
projects.description: During several missions a participatory market analysis was performed to determine opportune market systems. A qualitative stakeholder research helped to develop several value chain strengthening approaches and investment strategies to boost the economic development of Delmas 32 area.

projects.title: Social Business Development @ Cordaid
projects.description:
Co-creative proposition development for business units at Cordaid. 
a.o.;
- b.u. Health Care / Women Health: Business plan & roadmap for Social Enterprise Development and Organisational Transformation 
- b.u. Disaster Risk Reduction and Emergency Response: development of multiple social business propositions. The process delivered 3 unique value propositions and pitch-books to tap into international funding opportunities.
- b.u. Women's Leadership for Peace and Security: development of multiple social business propositions into working business models, products and services. We designed a product development process and provided tools and documentation for R&D investments.
- b.u. Community Security and Justice: development of a multi-phased business model and strategy for entry into fragile States.

contributors.headline: Social Justice Advocate, Consultant and Coach
Human Centered Design director at Proportion Global
Founder | Social Entrepreneur (connect, create, and have fun)

projects.title: Duurzaam Rosehaghe Haarlem
projects.description: Het complex van Woningbouwvereniging Rosehaghe bestaat uit 140 woningen en een verenigings-gebouw. Het hele complex is aangewezen als rijksmonument. In het kader van de Blok voor Blok aanpak van de gemeente Haarlem wil Rosehaghe haar woningbestand verduurzamen op gebied van energie, water, materiaal en levensloopbestendigheid. Aan Entremedio en de Huizendokter werd gevraagd de kansen hiervoor in beeld te brengen; technisch maar ook sociaal en gericht op gebruik, om zo vorm te geven aan de duurzaamheidsstrategie van Rosehaghe.

projects.title: Final evaluation retrofit and return strategy program - Care Haiti
projects.description:
- External evaluation for scale-up and subsequent programming already in pipeline of a Reconstruction program for owner driven retrofitting combined with a Return Strategy for Camp IDPs
- Final evaluation of a Reconstruction program for owner driven retrofitting combined with a Return Strategy for Camp IDPs funded by EU ECHO.

contributors.headline: Finance & Business Culture | YLAI Fellow 2021 |Sales Man | Ecosystem Builder | Writer | Founder of GBI

projects.title: Collective Neighborhood memory – Talking Walls (Sprekende Muren) @Ymere
projects.description: Historical events from the area, photos and quotes of residents, are temporarily displayed on giant-size posters through the neighborhood.  A huge amount of background information and stories of these events is available on the website groetenuitderoos.nl.  This digital platform is linked to the posters in the public space by using  QR-codes thus encourages interaction between residents, young and old, and strengthens the neighborhood feeling  while building a collective memory .

profile_positions.description:
And The People is a Social Design and consultancy studio that functions as a catalyst for positive change. We are proud to be a Certified B Corporation.

And The People designs solutions for a social and more sustainable society. 
We always start with exploring the perceptions, needs, behaviours and desires of end users and other important stakeholders. We work together with entrepreneurial minds; governments, NGO's and (social) businesses  in the Netherlands and internationally on solutions on community level. From a Dutch neighbourhood, a slum in Haiti or a rural village in Kenya.

Over the past years And The People has worked with: CARE, CRS, city of Amsterdam, Haarlem, The Salvation Army, Dutch Ministry, Alliander, J/P HRO, Cordaid, Proportion Foundation, World Bank, Philips, Procter & Gamble, Ymere.
profile_positions.title: Strategic designer & co-founder

profile_positions.description: Ever since I can hold a pencil I have been drawing. I use illustrations and visualizations professionally to make complex systems, propositions and strategies easier to understand. Next to that I am working on several children books. The first one 'meneer Lasagna' is self-published and now available.
profile_positions.title: illustrator

profile_positions.description:
Met de Opgewekte Woning Club helpen we buurten in Nederland om zelf aan de slag te gaan met energiebesparing en woningverbetering. De Opgewekte Club is een spin-off van And The People. 

www.opgewekteclub.nl
profile_positions.title: Co Founder

profile_positions.description:
We are a partner of the ProPortion Foundation, working together to support companies in realizing social business. We use creativity and design methods to translate local challenges into innovative business opportunities, and to identify the right partners for implementing solutions.

The mission of ProPortion is to realise social impact. That goes further than just strategic advice. It follows a pragmatic approach to get a deep understanding of the most relevant stakeholders of a company; such as the community, commercial stakeholders and (non- ) governmental organisations to co-create business solutions that are desirable, feasible and economically viable.
profile_positions.title: Sustainable Business Consultant

company.name: Entremedio - creating meaningful, social and sustainable solutions

profile_positions.company: Entremedio - creating meaningful, social and sustainable solutions
profile_positions.description:
Creating meaningful, social and sustainable solutions. National (Netherlands), and International (Haiti, Kenya, India)

Entremedio Social Solutions is a strategic design and consultancy firm in the field of sustainability and social design. Entremedio helps organizations in the Netherlands and developing countries to identify opportunities and generate solutions, together with the end user, to generate value for people, planet and businesses. Entremedio does so by organizing co-creative processes, and translates these results into business models and project propositions

We create sustainable solutions with a creative and strategic mindset that combines technical opportunities and social needs and challenges. We have acquired solid knowledge and working experience in diverse post disaster- and developing- countries, in urban and rural contexts, where we worked mainly in the sectors of BoP housing, shelter and settlements with integrated links to WASH, infrastructure, livelihood, education, and DRR.

In December 2015, Entremedio - creating meaningful, social and sustainable solutions, was re-branded to And The People.
profile_positions.title: Strategic designer & Co-founder
